headline: JCP&L Helping Lessen Impacts of Electricity Supply Price Increase During Hot Summer Months
summary: Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), has received approval from the New Jersey Board of Public Utilities (BPU) to implement measures that will help ease the impact of rising electricity prices on families.

headline: FirstEnergy Stock: Is FE Underperforming the Utilities Sector?
summary: FirstEnergy has underperformed the Utilities sector over the past year, but analysts are cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
